code: import{useContext}from"react";import{MdClose}from"react-icons/md";import{Context}from"../../../utils/context";import prod from"../../../assets/products/earbuds-prod-1.webp";import"./CartItem.scss";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CartItem=function CartItem(){var _useContext=useContext(Context),cartItems=_useContext.cartItems,handleCartProductQuantity=_useContext.handleCartProductQuantity,handleRemoveFromCart=_useContext.handleRemoveFromCart;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-products",children:cartItems.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"img-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:process.env.REACT_APP_DEV_URL+item.attributes.img.data[0].attributes.url,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"prod-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"name",children:item.attributes.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MdClose,{className:"close-btn",onClick:function onClick(){return handleRemoveFromCart(item);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quantity-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:function onClick(){return handleCartProductQuantity("dec",item);},children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:item.attributes.quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:function onClick(){return handleCartProductQuantity("inc",item);},children:"+"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:item.attributes.quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"x"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"highlight",children:["\u20B9",item.attributes.price*item.attributes.quantity]})]})]})]},item.id);})});};export default CartItem;
